subject: Order #SSN1853 - missing baseplate
description_text:
Hello, I have received the pedals in order #SSN1853 but it is missing the
baseplate. My order was for the version with the baseplate. Please send
that to me as soon as possible. Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Hoang Pham,    Sorry for the inconvenience, as we were out of stock in our US warehouse, so we sent you the pedal first, and we've reissued the base plate for you today, and it's expected to arrive around the 9th.  https://www.track718.us/en/detail?nums=9234690383093300086868
